sentences.en: 'Good - by and good riddance!'she said to him angrily as he left.
sentences.cn: 他离开时, 她生气地冲他说: “ 再见,你可算走了! ”

sentences.en: "How many times have I heard that before?" Merchant complained angrily.
sentences.cn: “我听过有多少次了？”麦钱特生气地抱怨道。

sentences.en: A man behind her tooted angrily.
sentences.cn: 她后面的一名男子愤怒地摁着汽车喇叭。

sentences.en: Coggins' eyes narrowed angrily. "You think I'd tell you?"
sentences.cn: 科金斯气得眯起眼睛。“你认为我会告诉你？”

sentences.en: He angrily tossed his tools and would work no longer.
sentences.cn: 他怒气冲冲地扔下工具不肯再干了.

sentences.en: He glared angrily at her but did not say a word.
sentences.cn: 他怒视着她,却一言不发.

sentences.en: He hit back angrily, saying such remarks were childishly simplistic.
sentences.cn: 他愤怒地反击，说这些话太过幼稚。
他愤怒地用拳捶击桌子。

sentences.en: He tore up the letter angrily and threw it into the wastebasket.
sentences.cn: 他气愤地把信撕掉,扔进字纸篓里.

sentences.en: Health workers are angrily demanding higher pay.
sentences.cn: 医务人员正怒气冲冲地要求增加工资。

sentences.en: Local residents have reacted angrily to the news.
sentences.cn: 当地居民对这一消息表示愤怒。

sentences.en: Officials reacted angrily to those charges.
sentences.cn: 官员们对那些指控很生气。

sentences.en: She crashed the plates angrily down on the table.
sentences.cn: 她生气地把盘子摔在桌子上.

sentences.en: She crushed up the letter angrily.
sentences.cn: 她愤怒地将信揉成一团。

sentences.en: She stomped angrily out of the office.
sentences.cn: 她怒气冲冲，重步走出办公室。

sentences.en: Then she stood up, wrapping her coat around her angrily.
sentences.cn: 然后她站了起来，怒气冲冲地穿上大衣。

words.tran_cn: 生气的；愤怒的；狂暴的；（伤口等）发炎的

trans.tran_cn: 愤怒地，生气地，气呼呼，气冲冲
